item.title: Wani Ctf 2024 Writeup
item.description: This is my writeup for Wani CTF Forensics Surveillance of sus A binary file is given, and after some investigation, it has a RDP8BMP Header. To get the BMP images, I have referred to this article and use a Python Script (bmc-tools). After all the bmp files are recovered, the flag can be readed in plain sight if the view is changed to “Large icons”. Flag : FLAG{RDP_is_useful_yipeee} Tiny USB A disk image file is given.

item.title: VSCTF Awa-Jelly Writeup
item.description: For this CTF, I only solved one question by myself, so here is the writeup for awa-jelly (reverse engineering) Hello Basically, the challenge is to recover the redacted input text so that the output is same as displayed. Although I know Python a little, I decided to use the traditional method: Excel ü§¶üèª Throughout my process, I tried to recover the scrambling algorithm by using Python, and I discovered some characters cannot be displayed after scrambling, which caused my natural approach to be weird due to some characters are missing.
